summary: Braith was running all of the day in Whiterun. She is now a young girl and may be your follower now.
descriptionHtml:
[b]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]Braith now follower[/size][/color]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]Braith[/size][/color]
[/b][size=2]Do you remember Braith?

She [font=Times New Roman TUR]wa[/font]s running all of the day in Whiterun.
She says for example; "What're you lookin' at? I'm not afraid of you, ya know. Even if you are my elder." etc.
She is the daughter of Amren and Saffir. A redguard family.
She stay in the Amren's House. They are living in Whiterun.

She is now a young girl and walking in Whiterun (no more running).
She does no longer fight with Lars Battle-Born.
She may be your follower now[font=Times New Roman TUR] but she can't marry.
[/font][/size][font=Times New Roman TUR][size=2]She is essential and invulnerable. Her voice is female young eager.
Her level rise with your character.
She is unaggressive and foolhardy. She helps friends and allies.[/size]

[/font][font=Times New Roman TUR][color=#9b00d3][font=Times New Roman TUR][color=#9b00d3][font=Times New Roman TUR][color=#9b00d3][size=4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url][/b][/size][/color][/font][/color][/font][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman TUR]
[/font][size=2]01 - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67985/?]Fast Start[/url] & [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69177/?]Turkish Translate[/url]
